Page1Data.title: Find the right solution for you
Page1Data.paragraph: Nessco can provide a wide range of feasibility and solutions. Our paper cup machine series has world-leading technology to help you make a variety of different paper cup products. These products will enable our customers to be ahead of their peers in terms of their product quality, materials and specifications.

products.title: Paper Cup With Lid
products.description: Paper cups are an eco-friendly choice for serving beverages. They are lightweight and perfect for both hot and cold drinks, offering convenience in various settings.

products.title: Paper Cup
products.description: Paper bowls are ideal for serving food items, offering a disposable and eco-friendly option. They are sturdy and can handle both hot and cold dishes.

products.title: Paper Bowl
products.description: Paper rolls are versatile and can be used for various purposes. They are commonly used for packaging and other industrial applications.

products.title: Paper Plate
products.description: Paper plates provide a convenient and disposable option for serving food at gatherings and events. They are eco-friendly and easy to use.

products.title: Paper Straw
products.description: Paper straws are a sustainable alternative to plastic straws. They are biodegradable and perfect for both hot and cold beverages.

products.title: Paper Bag
products.description: Paper bags are a popular choice for packaging and carrying items. They are sturdy, recyclable, and come in various sizes.

products.title: Paper Napkin
products.description: Paper napkins are a disposable and hygienic option for wiping hands or cleaning surfaces. They are soft, absorbent, and eco-friendly.

products.title: Paper Box
products.description: Paper boxes are widely used for packaging and storage. They are strong, durable, and available in various sizes.

Page3Data.paragraph: With world-leading technology and control of craftsmanship details, you can find Ruida's unique advantages:

container.title: 1. The machine can be applied to a wide range of sizes.
container.description: One machine on the market can only make paper cups 4-9oz/4-12oz, we can make from 2-16oz/16-22oz/22-32oz, and the maximum mouth of paper bowl can reach 300mm.

container.title: 2. The craftsmanship and detail far superior to other manufacturers
container.description: We have detail requirements for the rolled edge, folded bottom or knurling of paper cups. Often the first choice of some big brands or chain brands OEM factories, such as Starbucks, McDonald's, etc.

container.title: 3. Wide range of paper types available on the machine
container.description: Compared to other brand machines which can only produce PE coated paper, our machine issuitable for a coated paper etc. inaddition, the paper thickness we can make is also wider.

Page4Data.title: Start your customized project
Page4Data.paragraph: There are many details to consider when designing the finished size, of which market acceptance is the most important. Our team of professional designers will work with you to confirm the specifications and produce a prototype for mould design approval

container.description: The process begins with the sourcing of large paper rolls, typically made from food-grade paper that has been coated with a thin layer of polyethylene to make it waterproof. These rolls are the raw material that will be transformed into paper cups.

In the printing stage, the paper is fed into a high-speed printing machine that applies custom designs, logos, and other branding elements to the paper. This step is essential for creating branded cups that can be used for promotional purposes in cafes, restaurants, and events.

After printing, the paper rolls are sent to the cutting machine, where they are precisely cut into flat, fan-shaped pieces known as blanks. These blanks will form the body of the paper cup. Accurate cutting is critical to ensure that the pieces fit together perfectly during the forming stage, avoiding any gaps or misalignment.

The cut blanks are then shaped into a fan-like structure, ready to be formed into the cylindrical body of the cup. This step is important as it begins to give the paper its cup-like shape. The fan-shaped blanks are designed to make it easier to form a tight seam when the edges are joined together.

In this stage, the paper fan is rolled into a cylindrical shape, and the edges are sealed together to form the body of the cup. The machine uses heat and pressure to bond the edges of the paper and create a strong seam. This step transforms the flat blanks into the final cup shape, which is then ready for the next stage.

Once the cup body is formed, the bottom of the cup is sealed using a separate machine. This step involves applying a bottom piece and sealing it with heat and pressure to ensure the cup is watertight. This final step ensures that the cup can hold liquids without leaking.
